title: Strengthening Programming Practical Competencies: Cloud-Based Mathematical Learning Environment Design Using the 7P-ILD Model

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational theories of mathematics education and basic cloud platform utilization skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can design a cloud-based learning environment for math education by applying the seven principles of the 7P-ILD model.
Learners can design math content for PBL activities using cloud tools (Google Workspace, Padlet, etc.).
Learners can improve time management strategies in learning environment design through peer feedback.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
